ORIGAM Documentation : Validation Rule Lookup XPath

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Oct 30, 2015

An XPath that should return a string containing a Validation Rule.

Typically this will be AS:LookupValue function that will load the user created validation rule from the database.

Input context: Full document

Used In

see Validation Rule
